data.title: Holiday House Damir - Apartment 1

data.text:
Secluded beaches, tranquil pool days and cultural excursions this tranquil holiday retreat provides something for everyone. Quietly situated a 20-minute walk from Pula’s historic old town centre and a 10-minute drive from the beach this practical ground-floor apartment is the perfect base to explore the Istrian peninsula and comfortably sleeps four guests. Ideally set up for outside living, the property enjoys a large swimming pool with a spacious sun terrace and a sunny garden that is shared with one other apartment. Guests can also enjoy alfresco dining on the terrace complete with a stone barbeque. There is also an outdoor shower and a trampoline for the children. Inside, the property enjoys an eat-in kitchen fitted with; a dining table, a cooker hob, an oven, a coffee machine, a microwave and a fridge freezer Sleeping Bedroom 1: The first bedroom is furnished with a double bed, a chest of drawers and a wardrobe Bedroom 2: The second bedroom is furnished with two single beds, a flat-screen satellite TV and a wardrobe Bathrooms Bathroom: The bathroom is fitted with a shower, a washbasin and a WC Additional • Shared Pool (15th May - 15th Oct) • Shared Garden • Terrace • Outside dining • Outside table & chairs • BBQ • Free Wi-Fi • Airconditioning • Washing Machine • Car Recommended • Private parking • Public parking • Child friendly • Pets possible • Smoking is prohibited • Wheelchair access For larger groups, this property can be booked with ID 7615 Extra Airport transfer Location The property is located on the southern tip of the Istrian Peninsula in Croatia, in the district of Kaštanjer. Visitors can walk to Pula’s Roman Amphitheater in 20 minutes which sits just outside the city’s old town and is one of the largest surviving Roman arenas in the world In Pula's old town visitors will discover many boutiques, bars, eateries and historical sites, including; the Arch of the Sergii, Pula Cathedral and the Temple of Augustus. Those in search of a sunny beach day are spoilt for choice with numerous coves and beaches dotted along the coast, each with its own unique character and many within a 10-minute drive from the accommodation. There are also many sports facilities in the vicinity including tennis, beach volleyball, hiking trails, climbing and bicycle paths with bicycles for hire. Additionally, the sports harbour provides opportunities for; diving, sailing, surfing, water skiing, canoeing and rowing. From the ferry port in Fazana (a 20-minute drive) visitors can reach the Brijuni Islands, a national park with beautiful natural landscapes featuring a golf course, archaeological sites, beaches and a safari park. The accommodation is conveniently just a few minutes walk from the local supermarket, a restaurant, bus stop and children's playground. The closest international airport is Pula Airport (PUY), a 15-minute drive from the accommodation.

Please note that the pool is open from the 15th of May 2024 to the 15th of October 2024

A damage deposit of 300 has to be paid locally for groups under 21.
